title: cmd/gc accepts invalid: functions were only some parameters are named are accepted
body:
http://tip.golang.org/ref/spec#Function_types says:"Within a list of parameters or
results, the names (IdentifierList) must either all be present or all be absent."

However:

Nicos-MacBook-Pro:gong thakis$ ~/src/go/bin/go build tst.go 
Nicos-MacBook-Pro:gong thakis$ ~/src/go/bin/go version
go version devel +45732d262481 Wed May 22 12:28:58 2013 +1000 darwin/amd64
Nicos-MacBook-Pro:gong thakis$ cat tst.go 
package p

func f() (int, b int) {
  return
}
